choose_plan: Choose a plan that matches your investment philosophy
plan_description_flex: This plan allows investors to withdraw earned assets at any time with zero delay and restrictions. It's designed for easy access with low risk, perfect for first-time users.
plan_description_fixed: This plan offers stronger and more stable returns, allowing users to withdraw earned assets on the last day of each week. It's designed for weekly payouts and long-term growth.
when_earnings: When Will I Receive My Earnings?
exchange_transmission: The exchange transmission begins upon initial stake acquisition.
interest_distributed: Interest will be distributed to your account according to the plan timeline.
interest_credited: interest will be credited to your account on
consistent_payouts: consistent, scheduled payouts on the last day of each week
free_airdrop: If you continue to grow your asset, you will receive free weekly airdrop rewards.
when_withdraw: When Can I Withdraw My Assets?
withdraw_2_hours: After allocating to the Wealth Management plan of your choice, you can initiate a withdrawal request 2 hours before the settlement period.
withdraw_2_days: After allocating to the Wealth Management plan of your choice, you can initiate a withdrawal request 2 days before the settlement period.
withdrawal_note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Note: Withdrawal requests are not allowed on the day of settlement and the day before.
manage_funds: Please manage your funds accordingly if necessary.
vat_p2: We are obliged to collect 7.5% VAT for the European Commission.
vat_p3: VAT applies to certain banking services.
vat_note_body: This is not a price increase from BITGET.
vat_terms_body: BITGET is required to collect and remit VAT.
vat_disclaimer: PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS NOT FROM BITGET.
intro_text: The initial stake acquisition must meet the specified minimum amount provided. The returns plan is divided into two categories, each offering distinct advantages tailored to different investment preferences and risk profiles.
our_platform_desc: Bitget Wealth Management is a professional foreign exchange asset management platform dedicated to helping clients achieve steady wealth growth through carefully selected investment plans. Whether you are a high net worth individual, asset management expert, or a Bitget VIP member, we offer secure, efficient, and competitive wealth management solutions tailored to your needs.
why_trust_desc: We pride ourselves on being one of the safest, reliable, and trusted foreign assets exchange management platforms in the world. The company has been recognized by Forbes as one of the world's most trustworthy foreign exchange assets management marketplaces.
security_desc: For customers' asset payment guarantee and safety, we consult with independent cybersecurity experts to continually improve the security and stability of our platform.
vienna_desc: Bitget confirms that Vienna will serve as its planned EU headquarters supporting transparent regulatory engagement and strong internal controls as the firm prepares for MiCA implementation.
vienna_ops: The Austrian hub is expected to function as an operational center for compliance, governance, and supervisory coordination across the European Economic Area (EEA).
vienna_markets: Bitget said the headquarters will meet with local requirements in markets where services may be offered, reinforcing its focus on regulated expansion.
transparency_desc: Our operations are transparent and continually evolve to meet global compliance standards in cryptocurrency. We work closely with our agents and partners to keep our information accurate and our platform secure. Every service and product we offer reflects Bitget's industry-leading security and reliability.
compliance_desc: Our dedicated team of experts ensures that we follow strict compliance standards and protocols. Our team follows a comprehensive compliance management framework, which is overseen by senior management, to identify, assess, execute and evaluate effectively.
risk_examination: It is our responsibility to examine and identify any risks to or regarding our platform, and follow through with any necessary remediation.
external_risks_desc: Those that may arise from outside circumstances, such as incorrect information published by third-party advertisements from Bitget affiliates.
internal_risks_desc: Those that may arise from within our organization, such as unauthorized, inappropriate, illegal, or unethical actions taken by our employees.
local_regulators: In conjunction with our assessments and annual compliance reviews, we work with local regulators to ensure our compliance standards adhere to regional requirements.
electronic_identity_desc: We employ extensive electronic identity verification procedures to protect our platform and mitigate risks associated with fraud and illicit behavior.
sanctions_aml: Our stringent sanctions and anti-money laundering policies ensure compliance with all relevant jurisdictions, effectively preventing counterfeiting and other criminal activities.
cdd_process: Efficiency is key in our Customer Due Diligence (CDD) process. To streamline identity verification without compromising compliance, we utilize advanced technology such as facial recognition and automated cross-matching between provided identification and live selfies. This significantly shortens the identity verification process on Bitget, enhancing overall user experience and security.
blockchain_tools: External blockchain analytical tools are deployed to closely monitor transactions on our platform and reduce the risk of fraudulent activities and the appearance of high-risk clients. Due to the immutability and transparency of public blockchains, we are able to thoroughly examine transactions conducted on our platform.
high_risk_desc: High-risk clients include, but are not limited to: Clients from certain countries/regions, Government officials, Clients from certain industries (e.g., cash-intensive businesses)
risk_governance: Our Risk and Governance team assesses high-risk clients and takes appropriate measures, such as asset seizures or more frequent reviews and audits, based on the circumstances. This helps ensure platform security and successful profit allocation to our users while maintaining regulatory compliance.
important_risk_desc: Assets will only be credited after confirmation of user's first deposit or specified settlement date. Please carefully evaluate your asset utilization needs before investing.
low_risk_product: Bitget Wealth Management aims to be a low-risk product by rigorously selecting providers and controlling transaction risks to protect your assets.
bitget_security_note: Penetration testing and vulnerability assessments conducted biannually on our network. Swift corrective action taken if potential threats are detected. Advanced encryption protocols for all sensitive data. Prevention of unauthorized access or data modifications. All transmitted and stored data encrypted and securely maintained. Fault-tolerant storage systems for maximum reliability.
bitget_identity: We pride ourselves on being one of the safest, reliable, and trusted foreign assets exchange management platforms in the world.
forbes_recognition: The company has been recognized by Forbes as one of the world's most trustworthy foreign exchange assets management marketplaces.
security_feature_1: Penetration testing and vulnerability assessments conducted biannually on our network
security_feature_2: Swift corrective action taken if potential threats are detected
security_feature_3: Advanced encryption protocols for all sensitive data
security_feature_4: Prevention of unauthorized access or data modifications
security_feature_5: All transmitted and stored data encrypted and securely maintained
security_feature_6: Fault-tolerant storage systems for maximum reliability
high_risk_industries: Clients from certain industries (e.g., cash-intensive businesses)
fixed_returns_example: If you deposit on October 12, Bitget will credit the interest to your account before 6:00 PM (UTC+8) on October 18. Subsequent weekly payouts will follow according to the settlement schedule.
